name: Monolocale con WIFI cucina-bagno!
description:
Apartment Maggiore is a lovely open space with kitchen and bathroom, 25 sqm, is located inside a courtyard on the ground floor of a historic building, is available in Bologna and can accommodate up to 2 people.
It is located in the city center just a 10-minute walk from Piazza Maggiore and the two towers, in one of the main streets of Bologna "Strada Maggiore", a few minutes by bus from the central station, in an ideal location for those who want to visit the city on foot.
neighborhood_overview: City center, supermarket nearby, bars, shops and everything within walking distance

name: Luxury Suite Bologna Fiera
description: Luxury Suite is a modern accommodation, with attention to detail, equipped with all comforts. 100 meters from the entrance of the fair and 20 minutes walk from the historic center, convenient to all amenities. A studio apartment that consists of a double bed, sofa bed, kitchen, bathroom with XL shower, balcony and a beautiful whirlpool tub for two people with chromotherapy. Unlimited Wi-Fi and 2 Smart TVs are available to guests with the ability to access Netflix with their own account
neighborhood_overview:
The Suite is located in a strategic point of the city, a stone's throw from the entrance of the fair, less than 1 kilometer from the ring road and highways but at the same time a 15-minute walk from the historic center. Just below the house is the bus stop with which you can reach the center and station in a few minutes. Supermarket 5 min walk. Below the house are 2 bars, restaurants, breweries and nightclubs within walking distance.

BAR
- The first, more casual, is just below the porch 50 meters from the entrance door;
- The second one is called La Porta Caffè, it's open Monday-Friday from 7: 30 to 19: 30. It is very cute and with quality products and is a 2 minute walk away in Piazza Vieira de Mello 3/2a.
- The Esso vending machine bar is also open during the week.

There are two bars very close to the Suite;
The first, very informal, is right on the porch below the house;
The second is called La Porta Caffè, it is open from Monday to Fri
host_about: Ciao! Sono Federico, ho 44 anni e mi piace curare tutto nei minimi dettagli. Adoro lo sport ed il mondo del fitness, di professione sono un Personal Trainer. Mi piace viaggiare, il buon cibo e la musica.

name: Central Studio - New, minimal and green.
description:
New apartment with minimal design, in the very center of the city - 15 min away walking from central station, 5 mins from Piazza Maggiore (main square).

Air Conditioning! Big kitchen, shower for two, plenty of natural light, very fast Wi-Fi, 49''TV+Netflix and a selection of books and photo-books for your entertainment.
You'll also find coffee, tea and cooking essentials.
The sheets and towels we provide are industrially washed and sanitised.
CIAO!

(All parking info are under 'getting around')
neighborhood_overview:
The street has plenty of bars for both breakfast and drinks, and just three minutes away from the apartment is 'Mercato delle Erbe' which features a big food market, cheap spots to eat and an amazing fish restaurant.
Indian, pizza, vegan, panini, traditional bolognese, asian, piadina and supreme gelatos in the area.
You'll be given a list of all our favourites places :^)
Also, Bologna is quite small and everything is within walking distance.
There is a saying "not even children get lost in Bologna", which is kind of true.
host_about:
I'm a graphic designer, specialised in photography books.
I was born in Bologna and I'm back here after living abroad and traveling a lot in the last 15 years. Communication is key, and I speak english pretty well :^)

name: Cozy and Deluxe Apartment minutes from downtown
description:
Beautiful, cozy and relaxing apartment 7 minutes from city downtown.
the Apt is 90mt with AC in living room and kitchen
Huge brand new couch in living room with a 60 inch TV (sky, netflix and amazon prime available for free)
Bedroom present a kingsize bed (2.10mt x 1,90mt) for a complete and confortable relax
You can enjoy a little nice balcony that goes around my apt where to realx in the sun
Apt is at 4th floor with elevator in one of nicest and most prestigious neighboorhood of town
neighborhood_overview:
saragozza is one of the nicest , most prestigious place to live in all town. we are minutes from city center
can catch bus N 14 or N 21 to go to downtown just in front my house
also you can walk to "san luca" that is cathedral of Bologna on the hill
host_about:
Ciao!

I'm Federico a private chef and a wine lover. 

I've travelled the world living in USA and Australia for many years before coming back home and refine the art of local cousine
I've learn to cook from my grandmother and I like to share her secrets with you making you feel locals for a day :)

I'm happy to open the door of my kitchen to teach you my skill and show you how to make a perfect pasta from the scratch.

I'm born and raise in Bologna and I'm very attached to my roots , so I'm also the best person  to guide you also for a "food tour" across town and discover the few spots that are still for locals..
I'll take you to the best and hidden places to have the best food and show you the beaty of the city 

I speak fluent English, french and a bit of Spanish 

Book me and be ready to have a fun experiece :)

name: "Ci Vuole Leggerezza" Apartment  Free Parking
description:
Bright and large fully renovated apartment a stone's throw from Bologna.

Apartment of over 80sqm with two large bedrooms, the first double, the second with French bed and smart-working desk, large bathroom with glass-wall shower and washing machine.

The property is completed by a large living room with kitchenette equipped with induction burners, coffee machine with complimentary pods, kettle and a large Smart TV to enjoy your favorite TV series.

Free parking on the street
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the heart of the picturesque "Santa-Viola" neighborhood, a historic area of Bologna that offers a wide selection of restaurants, pizzerias and essential services such as supermarkets and pharmacies. Here you can find everything you need and want, right at your fingertips.

Among the gastronomic gems, the institution "Nonna Rosa" stands out, where you will have the opportunity to taste the most delicious Bolognese cotoletta in the world, along with other unique delicacies. In addition, the renowned "Pizzeria Due Lune" will make you taste an excellent pizza, representing the authentic heart of the Italian tradition.

A few steps away you will find the historic and delicious "Pasticceria Asta", an ideal place for dreamy breakfasts.

The neighborhood is characterized by numerous parks and green areas.

Located in the heart of the picturesque "Santa-Viola" district, an historical area of Bologna boasting an array of restaurants, pizzerias, and essential services such as supermarkets and pharmacies. Everything you need and desire is within reach.

Among the culinary treasures, stands the iconic "Nonna Rosa," where you can savor the world's finest Bolognese cutlet and other unique delicacies. The renowned "Pizzeria Due Lune" offers an exquisite pizza, embodying the essence of Italian tradition.

Just 50 meters from your residence lies the historic and delightful "Pasticceria Asta," perfect for dreamy breakfasts.

The district features several parks, and for fitness enthusiasts, Bologna's city center is a pleasant walk away.

Ample parking spaces and renowned tranquility characterize.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighbour has plenty of bars for both breakfast and drinks, just five minutes away from the apartment is 'Mercato delle Erbe' which features a big food market, cheap spots to eat and an amazing fish restaurant.

Pizza, vegan, panini, traditional bolognese, asian, piadina and supreme gelatos in the area.
You'll be given a list of all our favourites places ;^)

Also, Bologna is quite small and everything is within walking distance.
There is a saying "not even children get lost in Bologna", which is kind of true.

Well-maintained parks offer tranquil green spaces for relaxation and rejuvenation, while excellent transport connections make it easy to explore all that Bologna has to offer. With a lively cultural atmosphere and a rich history reflected in every corner, the surroundings of Via Gramsci are the perfect place to enjoy city life to the fullest.

neighborhood_overview:
Historic Architecture:
Via Fondazza is famous for its elegant ancient houses with porticos, a distinctive feature of Bologna. The porticos provide shelter from the sun and rain, making it pleasant to stroll in any weather.

Giorgio Morandi's House:
Just a few steps from Via Fondazza 11 is the house where the famous painter Giorgio Morandi lived. Today, it is a museum displaying the artist's works and personal objects, offering an intimate glimpse into his life and work.

Charming Streets and Alleys:
The narrow, cobblestone streets of the neighborhood create a charming and romantic atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing walk. The alleys are filled with artisanal shops, art galleries, and historic boutiques.

Local Life:
The neighborhood is lively and frequented by both residents and university students. You'll find numerous cafes, bars, and restaurants where you can taste traditional Bolognese cuisine, such as the famous tagliatelle al ragù
host_about:
Mi reputo una persona disponibile e cerco di essere attento ed entrare in empatia con le persone, sociale e con tanta voglia di fare , spesso anche piu' del necessario.
Amo le persone oneste e corrette e odio le ingiustizie.
